SA15dhknyayu:01009_0: sva-viṣaya-anantara-viṣaya-sahakāriṇā indriya-jñānena samanantarapratyayena janitaṃ tan manovijñānam.
SA15dhknyayu:01013_0: yasya arthasya saṃnidhāna-asaṃnidhānābhyāṃ jñāna-pratibhāsa-bhedas tat svalakṣaṇam.
SA15dhknyayu:01018_0: tad eva ca pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇa-phalam.
SA15dhknyayu:02003_0: tatra svārthaṃ trirūpāl liṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam.
SA15dhknyayu:02005_0: trairūpyaṃ punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva,
SA15dhknyayu:02005_1: sapakṣa eva sattvam, asapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam.
SA15dhknyayu:02009_0: tato anyas tad-viruddhas tad-abhāvaś ca iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02012_0: tatra anupalabdhir yathā, na pradeśa-viśeṣe kvacid ghaṭaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:02014_0: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣu upalambha-pratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāva-viśeṣaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:02017_0: kāryaṃ yathā vahnir atra dhūmād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02019_0: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho arthaṃ gamayet.
SA15dhknyayu:02021_0: sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhye arthe liṅgasya.
SA15dhknyayu:02024_0: te ca tādātmya-tadupattī svabhāva-kāryayor eva iti tābhyām eva vastu-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:02027_0: anyathā ca anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpteṣu deśa-kāla-svabhāva-viprakṛṣṭeṣv artheṣv ātma-pratyakṣa-nivṛtter abhāva-niścaya-abhāvāt.
SA15dhknyayu:02028_0: amūḍha-smṛti-saṃskārasya atītasya vartamānasya ca pratipattṛ-pratyakṣasya nivṛttir abhāva-vyavahāra-pravartanī.
SA15dhknyayu:02031_0: svabhāva-anupalabdhir yathā, na atra dhūma upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptasya anupalabdhir iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02032_0: kārya-anupalabdhir yathā, na iha apratibaddha-sāmarthyāni dhūma-kāraṇāni santi dhūma-abhāvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02033_0: vyāpaka-anupalabdhir yathā, na atra śiṃśapā, vṛkṣa-abhāvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02034_0: svabhāva-viruddha-upalabdhir yathā, na atra śīta-sparśo vahner iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02035_0: viruddha-kārya-upalabdhir yathā, na atra śīta-sparśo dhūmād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02036_1: na dhūma-bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:02037_0: kārya-viruddha-upalabdhir yathā, na iha apratibaddha-sāmarthyāni śīta-kāraṇāni santi, vahner iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02038_0: vyāpaka-viruddha-upalabdhir yathā, na atra tuṣāra-sparśo vahner iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02039_0: kāraṇa-anupalabdhir yathā, na atra dhūmo vahny-abhāvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02040_0: kāraṇa-viruddha-upalabdhir yathā, na asya roma-harṣa-ādi-viśeṣāḥ, saṃnihita-dahana-viśeṣatvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:02042_0: ime sarve kārya-anupalabdhy-ādayo daśa-anupalabdhi-prayogāḥ svabhāva-anupalabdhau saṃgraham upayānti.
SA15dhknyayu:02044_0: prayoga-darśana-abhyāsāt svayam apy evaṃ vyavaccheda-pratītir bhavati iti svārthe apy anumāne asyāḥ prayoga-nirdeśaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:02045_0_0: sarvatra ca asyām abhāva-vyavahāra-sādhanyām anupalabdhau yeṣāṃ svabhāva-viruddha-ādīnām
SA15dhknyayu:02045_0_1: upalabdhyā kāraṇa-ādīnām anupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānām.
SA15dhknyayu:03008_0: tatra sādharmyavat prayogaḥ: yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ sann na upalabhyate so asad-vyavahāra-viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:03008_2: na upalabhyate ca kaścit pradeśa-viśeṣa upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpto ghaṭa ity anupalabdhi-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03009_0: tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ: yat sat tat sarvam anityam, yathā ghaṭa-ādir iti śuddhasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03010_0: yad utpattimat tad anityam iti svabhāvabhūta-dharma-bhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03011_0: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity upādhi-bhedena.
SA15dhknyayu:03012_0: apekṣita-para-vyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāva-niṣpattau kṛtaka iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03014_0: sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣa-dharma-upadarśanam.
SA15dhknyayu:03021_0: kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ: yatra dhūmas tatra agniḥ, yathā mahānasa-ādau. asti ca iha dhūma iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03022_0: iha api siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03023_0: vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ: yat sad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ tad upalabhyata eva,
SA15dhknyayu:03023_1: yathā nīla-ādi-viśeṣaḥ. na ca evam iha upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptasya sata upalabdhir ghaṭasya ity anupalabdhi-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03024_0: asaty anityatve na asty eva sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā.
SA15dhknyayu:03024_1: saṃś ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako vā iti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03025_0: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmaḥ. atra ca asti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03026_0: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-gatir iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03030_0: na hi svabhāvapratibandhe asaty ekasya nivṛttav aparasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03031_0: sa ca dviprakāraḥ sarvasya. tādātmya-lakṣaṇas tadutpatti-lakṣaṇaś ca ity uktam.
SA15dhknyayu:03032_0: tena hi nivṛttiṃ kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03032_2_0: yac ca pratibandha-upadarśanaṃ tad eva anvaya-vacanam ity ekena api vākyena anvaya-mukhena
SA15dhknyayu:03032_2_1: vyatireka-mukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣa-asapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattva-khyāpanaṃ
SA15dhknyayu:03032_2_2: kṛtaṃ bhavati iti na avaśyaṃ vākya-dvaya-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03033_0: anupalabdhāv api: yat sad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ tad upalabhyata eva ity ukte,
SA15dhknyayu:03033_1: anupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśam asad iti pratīter anvaya-siddheḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03034_0: dvayor apy anayoḥ prayogayor na avaśyaṃ pakṣa-nirdeśaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03035_0: yasmāt sādharmyavat-prayoge api yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ san na upalabhyate so asad-vyavahāra-viṣayaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03035_1: na upalabhyate ca atra upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpto ghaṭa ity ukte sāmarthyād eva na iha ghaṭa iti bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03036_2: sa upalabhyata eva. na tathā atra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyata ity ukte sāmarthyād eva na iha sad-vyavahāra-viṣaya iti bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03038_0: svarūpeṇa eva svayam iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03040_0: svarūpeṇa eva iti sādhyatvena eva iṣṭo na sādhanatvena api.
SA15dhknyayu:03041_0: yathā śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:03041_1: śabde asiddhatvāt sādhyam. na punas tad iha sādhyatvena eva iṣṭam,
SA15dhknyayu:03044_0: etena yady api kvacic śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanam āha:
SA15dhknyayu:03044_1: tac śāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇy aneka-dharma-abhyupagame api yas tadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:03044_2: sa eva sādhyo na itara ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03045_0: iṣṭa iti yatra arthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasya siddhim icchatā so anukto api vacanena sādhyaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03047_0: yathā parārthaś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03047_1: atra ātma-arthā ity anuktāv apy ātma-arthatā sādhyā.
SA15dhknyayu:03047_2: tena na ukta-mātram eva sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03048_0: anirākṛta iti, etal-lakṣaṇa-yoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo apy arthaḥ pratyakṣa-anumāna-pratīti-sva-vacanair nirākriyate,
SA15dhknyayu:03049_0: tatra pratyakṣa-nirākṛto yathā, aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03054_0: evaṃ siddhasya, asiddhasya api sādhanatvena abhimatasya,
SA15dhknyayu:03054_3: tena eva svarūpeṇa abhimato vādina iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣa-lakṣaṇam anavadyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03055_1: tatra trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhanābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03056_0: uktāv apy asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādya-pratipādakayoḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03057_0: ekasya rūpasya dharmi-sambandhasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddho hetvābhāsāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03058_0: yathā, anityaḥ śabda iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvam ubhaya-asiddham.
SA15dhknyayu:03059_0: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarva-tvag-apaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādy-asiddham,
SA15dhknyayu:03060_0: acetanāḥ sukha-ādaya iti sādhye utpattimatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino asiddham.
SA15dhknyayu:03061_0: tathā svayaṃ tad-āśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03062_0: yathā bāṣpa-ādi-bhāvena sandihyamāno bhūta-saṃghāto agni-siddhāv upadiśyamānaḥ sandigdha-asiddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03063_0: yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03065_0: dharmy-asiddhāv apy asiddhaḥ, yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sādhye sarvatra upalambhamāna-guṇatvam.
SA15dhknyayu:03066_0: tathā ekasya rūpasya asapakṣe asattvasya asiddhāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03067_0: yathā śabdasya anityatva-ādike dharme sādhye prameyatva-ādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra ekadeśe vā vartamānaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03068_0: tathā, asya eva rūpasya sandehe apy anaikāntika eva.
SA15dhknyayu:03069_0: yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimān vā sādhye vaktṛtva-ādiko dharmaḥ sandigdha-vipakṣa-vyāvṛttikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03070_0: sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate ity evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya-ātma-viṣayatvena sandeha-hetutvāt.
SA15dhknyayu:03071_0: vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor virodha-abhāvāc ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavati ity adarśane api vyatireko na sidhyati sandehāt.
SA15dhknyayu:03076_0: sa ca dvividho api virodho vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor na sambhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03077_0: na ca aviruddha-vidher anupalabdhāv apy abhāva-gatiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03079_0: arthāntarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana-āder nivṛttiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03083_0: sapakṣe sattvasya, asapakṣe ca asattvasya, yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03084_0: anayoḥ sapakṣe asattvam, asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyaya-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03086_0: nanu ca tṛtīyo api iṣṭa-vighāta-kṛd viruddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03087_0: yathā parārthāś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03091_0: na hy ayam ābhyāṃ sādhya-viparyaya-sādhanatvena bhidyate.
SA15dhknyayu:03092_0: na hi iṣṭa-uktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścid viśeṣa iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03093_0: dvayo rūpayor ekasya asiddhāv aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03094_0: yathā vīta-rāgaḥ kaścit sarvajño vā, vaktṛtvād iti. vyatireko atra asiddhaḥ, sandigdho anvayaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03095_0: sarvajña-vīta-rāgayor viprakarṣād vacana-ādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham.
SA15dhknyayu:03096_0: anayor eva dvayo rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03098_0: na hi sātmaka-nirātmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra ayaṃ prāṇa-ādir vartate.
SA15dhknyayu:03101_0: sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā prasiddhe prāṇa-āder asiddheḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03102_0: tasmāj jīvaccharīra-sambandhī prāṇa-ādiḥ sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvena asiddhes tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate.
SA15dhknyayu:03105_0: na api sātmakād anātmakāc ca tasya anvaya-vyatirekayor abhāva-niścayaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03109_0: evam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogam asiddha-viruddha-anaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03110_0: viruddhāvyabhicāry api saṃśaya-hetur uktaḥ. sa iha kasmān na uktaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03112_0: na hi sambhavo asti kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor anupalambhasya ca viruddhatāyāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03114_0: tasmād avastu-darśana-bala-pravṛttam āgama-āśrayam anumānam āśritya tad-artha-vicāreṣu viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhana-doṣa uktaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03116_0: na hy asya sambhavo yathāvasthita-vastu-sthitiṣv ātma-kārya-anupalambheṣu.
SA15dhknyayu:03117_0: tatra udāharaṇam: yat sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam,
SA15dhknyayu:03117_1: yathā ākāśam. abhisambadhyate ca sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03119_0: na hi yo yatra na asti tad-deśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāvahetu-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03120_0: dvitīyo api prayogaḥ: yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ san na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti.
SA15dhknyayu:03120_1: tad yathā, kvacid avidyamāno ghaṭaḥ. na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyakty-antarāleṣv iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03120_2: ayam anupalambhaḥ svabhāvaś ca paraspara-viruddha-artha-sādhanād ekatra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03121_0: trirūpo hetur uktaḥ. tāvatā ca artha-pratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhana-avayavaḥ kaścid.
SA15dhknyayu:03121_1: tena na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gata-arthatvāt.
SA15dhknyayu:03122_0: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena.
SA15dhknyayu:03122_1: punar viśeṣeṇa kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor janma-tan-mātra-anubandhau darśanīya-avaktau.
SA15dhknyayu:03122_2: tac ca darśayatā, yatra dhūmas tatra agniḥ, asaty agnau na kvacid dhūmo yathā mahānasa-itarayoḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:03122_5: ghaṭa-ākāśayoḥ, iti darśanīyam. na hy anyathā sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathokta-prakāre śakye darśayitum.
SA15dhknyayu:03122_8: asmiṃś ca arthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:03123_0: etena eva dṛṣṭānta-doṣā api nirastā bhavanti.
SA15dhknyayu:03126_2: iṣṭa-puruṣa-vat. anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭa-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03127_0: tathā viparīta-anvayaḥ, yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03129_0: vaidharmyeṇa api, paramāṇu-vat karma-vat ākāśa-vad iti sādhya-ādy-avyatirekiṇaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03130_1: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapila-ādayo anāptā vā avidyamāna-sarvajñatā-āptatā-liṅgabhūta-pramāṇa-atiśaya-śāsanatvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03130_2: atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam, yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotir-jñāna-ādikam upadiṣṭavān,
SA15dhknyayu:03130_4: tatra asarvajñatā anāptayoḥ sādhya-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03131_1: na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhya-vacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimattvād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03131_2: atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam, ye grāhya-vacanā na te rāga-ādimantaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03131_3: tad yathā gautama-ādayo dharma-śāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03132_1: avīta-rāgāḥ kapila-ādayaḥ, parigraha-āgraha-yogād iti. atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam,
SA15dhknyayu:03132_3: yathā ṛṣabha-āder iti. ṛṣabha-āder avīta-rāgatva-parigraha-āgraha-yogayoḥ sādhya-sādhana-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03133_0: avyatireko yathā, avīta-rāgo ayaṃ vaktṛtvāt. vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam, yatra avīta-rāgatvaṃ na asti na sa vaktā,
SA15dhknyayu:03133_1: yathā upala-khaṇḍa iti. yady apy upala-khaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathā api sarvo vīta-rāgo na vaktā iti vyāptyā vyatireka-asiddher avyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:03134_0: apradarśita-vyatireko yathā, anityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād ākāśa-vad iti vaidharmyeṇa.
SA15dhknyayu:03135_0: viparīta-vyatireko yathā, yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati iti.
SA15dhknyayu:03136_0: na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ vā.
SA15dhknyayu:03138_0: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatā-ādayaḥ sādhana-doṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam.
